group_1.narration: So, as one thing led to another,@we visited a restaurant near Mizuna Castle...
―Yukika―@I'm so glad to have been born@on a planet with a moon!

group_1.textRight: You’re... Really that moved by it?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
I thought that I wouldn't live to see it again.

group_1.textRight: Okay...?

group_1.textCenter: Miss Yukika! These dumplings are delicious!

group_1.textRight: Hey! Who do you think you are, saying@something like that!?
I wanted to tell her about them first!

group_1.textLeft: (They’re fighting over compliments!?)
(Ah, and you’re apologizing...!?)
(They... Really have no idea, do they...)
(About the White Feather who saved them in@the "back side" of the world,)
(and who passed away quietly and unnoticed...)
(Nor about the Kyubey who granted Rion's wish.)

group_1.textRight: Miss Nanase...?

group_1.narration: ―Yukika―@The same old face of the moon as always.@The same boring world as always...
―Yukika―@Tonight, they both shine brilliantly to me.

group_1.textCenter: Kyubey. If you’re there, please come out.

group_1.textRight: What do you need, Yukika Nanase?

group_1.textLeft: I came here to talk to you.
If I left Kamihama, I thought that we could@meet again.

group_1.textRight: Ah... So we’re talking about that test we ran,@I see.
You're correct that one of us was left behind in@Kamihama City.
It is true that I tried to form a new contract@with a Magical Girl...
But I will not try that again in Kamihama in@the future.

group_1.textLeft: Eh? Why’s that?

group_1.textRight: There are several reasons.
One is that the test results were not clear.
I don’t know what happened regarding the@contract with Rion Yuzuki.

group_1.textLeft: You don’t...?
But you heard about everything I just told you@from the other Kyubey, right?
Your poor fellow Kyubey who died inside of@the Labyrinth...

group_1.textRight: This is the first time that I've heard of that.

group_1.textLeft: ...That Kyubey remembered it, but this@one doesn't?
Maybe... This is because of her wish.
Besides that one Kyubey, maybe all of your@memories were rewritten?

group_1.textRight: Possibly. But in any case...
The Kyubey who formed a contract with Rion@Yuzuki vanished alongside the Labyrinth.
There isn’t anyone who can prove your@words now.

group_1.textLeft: (In the end, the errors in her wish's modification@disappeared.)
(Now the world has been completely rewritten...)

group_1.narration: All that's left is my memories.

group_1.textRight: Well, as a result of the test, the last Kyubey in@Kamihama City is gone.
The act of contracting is now very difficult,@and the outcome's are unclear.
It's reasonable to say there's no reason to keep@testing in Kamihama City.

group_1.textLeft: So you won’t interfere with Kamihama...?

group_1.textRight: Yes.

group_1.textLeft: Come to think of it... I have a question.
By any chance, Kyubey, do you know if...

group_1.textRight: Your Soul Gem was completely muddied,@and you thought it was over...
But when you'd awakened, you'd won?
Oh, that's simple. You used a phenomenon@called a Doppel.

group_1.textLeft: Eh?

group_1.textRight: It's a system that utilizes Soul Gems that have@begun to create a curse...
Where you're placed in a Witch-like state that@grants you explosive power.

group_1.textLeft: I know that much...

group_1.textRight: The system that was developed in Kamihama City@is still being maintained.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh...?
I didn’t know that.
I’m trying to not get involved with the Wings of@the Magius anymore.

group_1.textRight: Hm... Maybe...
Maybe the fact that you didn’t know that was@part of the reason you won.

group_1.textLeft: What is that supposed to mean?

group_1.textRight: As a Magical Girl, the slimmer you perceive your@odds of success...
The more your power shines.

group_1.textLeft: That just makes it sound like...
...I'm some completely unhinged gambler,@doesn't it?!

group_1.textRight: All I did was objectively state your nature as a@Magical Girl.
The way that you couldn't get close to the old@school building at first...
How only you had contradictions in their@memories and were full of doubt...
Were so you could fight the Witch exactly when@you'd be sure to win.
In short, it happened in order to force you to@make a life-or-death gamble...
Thinking about it this way satisfies many of the@questions involved.

group_1.textLeft: I’m not satisfied.

group_1.textRight: See you later then, Yukika.
Thanks to you, I gained some valuable information.

group_1.textLeft: Phew... So is this case closed?
Time to go ho―
...What?

group_1.textRight: Oh, Yukika! Right on time!

group_1.textCenter: This is bad! Kaharun is in trouble...

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.narration: What on Earth did I get involved in this time...?
